description:
Edward M. Graves, Jr. and Edward M. Graves III are personal injury lawyers handling injury and accident cases throughout the state of Tennessee in both State and Federal courts with a combined 32 years of experience handling accident and injury cases. We are committed to providing the best possible representation of injured people and the families of those killed under wrongful death circumstances.

Hiring the right attorney is the most crucial part of getting the best possible recovery. If you hire us to represent you in your case, we will personally guide you through the legal, personal, and financial challenges you will face on your road to obtaining the best possible result. We will not assign your case to other attorneys or paralegals. We provide our clients with personal attention and service throughout the litigation and claims resolution process. We aggressively pursue our clients' claims not only to obtain the best financial recovery for our clients, but we are also concerned about our clients getting the medical care and attention they deserve. For more information, please click here: Personal Injury Information Center. In accident and injury cases, you will not pay us a fee unless and until we obtain money for you.

We offer FREE, IMMEDIATE CONSULTATION in one of our offices, your home, your hospital room, on the phone, or via email, whichever you prefer. Consultations with us are confidential. Contact us by using the Quick Contact section on the right or following this link
